roleset.name: serve as an example of
roleset.note: EXEMPLIFY-V NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from exemplify.01-v)

example.name: making an example of
example.text: The decision to cancel the loan exemplifies the tough attitude bankers have taken toward China since June 4.
example.arg: The decision to cancel the loan
the tough attitude bankers have taken toward China since June 4
